img_summary: The image depicts the "Skandha of Form," a rare item in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." This item is part of a collection of Skandha key items, each representing different aspects of existence. The Skandha of Form, like its counterparts, holds a secret and is used to create the Skandhas Pill from Xu Dog in Yellow Wind Ridge. It is connected to the narrative of exploring the metaphysical elements hidden within Buddha's head, emphasizing the theme of uncovering hidden treasures and secrets.
